mapper.sql: id, type, rms_key, rms_value, description, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, del_flag
mapper.insert: insert into dictionary (id, type, rms_key, rms_value, description, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rmsKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rmsValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into dictionary
id,
type,
rms_key,
rms_value,
description,
create_user,
create_time,
update_user,
update_time,
del_flag,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update dictionary
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rms_key = #{rmsKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rms_value = #{rmsValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dictionary set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rms_key = #{rmsKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rms_value = #{rmsValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from dictionary where del_flag=0 and type = #{type} order by create_time desc

SELECT FROM dictionary a where del_flag = 0
and type LIKE CONCAT(#{vo.parameters.type},'%' )
or description LIKE CONCAT(#{vo.parameters.description},'%' )
